name: The Last Tower (itch)
description:
You are the only Samurai Warrior that can save the world from the destruction
of Ikaro, the Giant Demon that will eat the earth..

There's a leyend that talks about the thee turrets of the Gods. 
That hold's the world from the entrance of evil forces.

All the towers have been destroyed completely, you need to protect the last
one facing Ikaro, who's summoning creatures in the clouds waiting for start his
destruction.

It will be a tough mission, Diabolical Creatures and Ghosts will
try to enter and destroy the turret, be focused!

Teleport, and slice that monsters to save the planet!!

--  Inspired in Samurai Jack and Metin 2 !!

PD: The game still under progress until the end of the jam!

______________________________________

CONTROLS

-WASD- Move

-Left Click- Tornado Attack

-Right Click- Flash Dash

-SPACE + AD-  Dodge

 #gmtkjam
